schema.name: Label
schema.description: Generally a city label (i.e. "slc_ut"), but can be whatever dev wants (i.e. "dev", "offline")

schema.name: OTARequestTimestamp
schema.description: Time that user sent an OTA request to device

schema.name: OTARequestVersion
schema.description: OTA binary version user sent as request to device

schema.name: ActiveFirmwareVersion
schema.description: Current active binary version used by the device

schema.name: AddedManually
schema.description: If True, this device was added to this table manually via airu_production/assembly.py. If False or NULL, it was found publishing to telemetry.telemetry and added automatically
